column2: an A.M. Eatery////This is by far my favorite brunch place to go to in Houston although the wait is usually around an hour since it's so popular. At my most recent visit
column3: I got the Pancake Flight (Sunburst Cakes
column5: and White chocolate/chocolate pancake of the day) with a side of hashbrowns and my bf got the Shrimp and Grits.
